A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I liked: J.Williams's score. Some wow scenes. 
I did not like: the story\, how characters are treated. There are so many massive and blatant flaws to the writing that it begs the question of whether Johnson and Kennedy are blinded by their own hubris. The choices are controversial and I personally I left the movie a bit heart broken. Okay clearly Disney and Kennedy dont' care as I won't be buying any toys: I am white male\, late 30's\, grew up with SW and Luke as my childhood hero. « Kill it if you have to »says Kylo about the past. Johnson killed a bit of me in this movie. 

Also it looks like Johnson never spoke to J.J. Abrams - nothing connects and most of the plots lend completely flat with no emotional impact but one of frustration and waste of screen time.

I am for the first time in my life not really excited about what's coming next in the saga. Too bad.
